<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Device ID Site Configs (v2.0)</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/sdwan/v2.0/api/sites/{site_id}/deviceidconfigs"}></MethodEndpoint>



List all the device ID site configs.

## Request
